forest.title: The Arrayanes Forest
forest.subtitle: A Natural Treasure Found in Very Few Places on the Planet
forest.description: The Arrayanes Forest is a unique ecosystem where arrayán trees (Luma apiculata) grow to become trees over 15 meters tall. Their cinnamon-colored bark and evergreen foliage create a dreamlike landscape that inspired Walt Disney's Bambi animation.
forest.feature1: Centennial trees up to 600 years old
forest.feature3: Protected ecosystem as a Natural Monument
forest.feature4: Endemic flora and fauna of the region

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long is the complete tour?
faq.a1: The complete tour takes approximately 4 hours, including the catamaran trip and exploration time in the Arrayanes Forest.
faq.a2: We recommend comfortable clothing, appropriate walking shoes, sunscreen, hat, and camera. In winter, bring adequate warm clothing.
faq.q3: Does the tour operate in the rain?
faq.a3: Yes, the tour operates in all weather conditions, except in cases of severe storms for safety reasons. The catamaran has covered spaces.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer special rates for groups of more than 10 people. Contact us for more information.
faq.q5: Can food be purchased on board?
faq.a5: The catamaran has a bar where you can purchase drinks and snacks during the trip.
faq.q6: Is it accessible for people with reduced mobility?
faq.a6: The catamaran has facilities for people with reduced mobility. Please notify us in advance to ensure the best assistance.
